channel.title: Need Help With my Client
channel.description:
heya all, i didn't know were to put so i thought it sorta goes into "clients" i was wondering to fix the client i am making will i need JDK to let me see .class files or what program do i need to see them, why my client has this error "Error: loaderror Starting up 20" i can't seem to get a pic of it but this is what it says and any help will b greatly appreciated thanks,
------------------------------ Connecting to Barrage Client
Loading Barrage Client Error: loaderror starting up 20
------------------------------
:D :D :D

item.title: Need Help With my Client
item.dc:creator: @I_B4RR4G3z_I I B4RR4G3z I
item.description:
@I_B4RR4G3z_I wrote:

yea all my other clients work
do i have to input item id’s for it to load up or something??
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 14, 2008, 01:34:15 PM[/size][hr]heya i’ll use a ayudascape client source cause i like the interface=] thanks anyway matey[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 17, 2008, 01:29:09 AM[/size][hr]i found the problem, its in the run.bat i right click then edit, its got path to JDK but previous version and i can’t find it nowere
